Extra-Schedular Consideration in Pension Claims
In pension claims, consider the issue of entitlement to an extra-schedular evaluation under
38 CFR 3.321(b)(2)
whenever a Veteran fails to meet the schedular requirements for permanent and total (P&T) disability.Â  If approval is recommended, forward the rating decision and claims folder to the Veterans Service Center Manager, Pension Management Center Manager, or designee for signature.
